metadata.description: Collection of agent skills for AI coding assistants

plugins.name: postgres
plugins.description: Execute read-only SQL queries against multiple PostgreSQL databases. Supports intelligent database selection based on descriptions, blocks all write operations for safety.

plugins.name: imagen
plugins.description: Generate images using Google Gemini's AI image generation model. Cross-platform support for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Create UI mockups, icons, illustrations, diagrams, and more.

plugins.name: deep-research
plugins.description: Perform autonomous multi-step research using Gemini Deep Research Agent. Literature reviews, competitive analysis, market research with citations.

plugins.name: outline
plugins.description: Search, read, and manage Outline wiki documents. Full CRUD operations for any Outline wiki instance (cloud or self-hosted).

plugins.name: jules
plugins.description: Delegate coding tasks to Google Jules AI agent. Asynchronously fix bugs, add documentation, implement features, write tests. Works with GitHub repos. Requires: npm install -g @google/jules
